title: Mario on Receiving Gabby’s First Impression Rose
description:
Becca and Michelle kick off Gabby and Rachel’s season premiere with Gabby’s First Impression Rose recipient, Mario! In their conversation, Mario shares how it felt to be one of only two guys to get a rose on night one, how getting the First Impression Rose created pressure on him to stand out, and why he is glad he kept his shirt on as he met the Bachelorettes for the first time. 

Plus, Michelle and Becca share their thoughts on how Gabby and Rachel did on their first night as the Bachelorettes, and in a game of rapid fire, Mario shares more about himself with Bachelor Nation.

Don’t forget to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode.
